info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 1 week ago,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
We had an incredible stay at this Airbnb! The house was beautifully furnished and immaculately clean. The host was extremely accommodating and responsive to any questions we had. The location was perfect - close to all the necessary amenities. The amenities provided exceeded our expectations, from the fully equipped kitchen to the cozy living room.
Overall, it was a fantastic experience, and we can't wait to return.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 3 weeks ago,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: I have stayed in about 8 Airbnbs in Dhaka, this one was the best. Clean, spacious, comfortable, beautiful apartment.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
This was my second stay here and the apartment is a perfect fit for me. I could live here.
Abdullah and his wife are perfect hosts.
One pleasant surprise on this second stay was finding out how lively the Baridhara neighborhood is. I had heard all about Gulshan, but I liked Baridhara better.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Wonderful place to stay. I have stayed in more than 200 airbnb apartments and this was one of the very best.
It was spacious with two bedrooms and two balconies. It was well furnished and the bed was comfortable. It was also relatively quiet.
Abdullah speaks excellent English and arranged an Uber driver to pick me up at the chaotic airport. He and his wife showed overwhelming hospitality.
I highly recommend this apartment.

rating_comment: Very nice I wasn’t expect that but it was clear and owner was really a good person. I recommend for all

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
Nestled in a tranquil setting, this two-bedroom apartment exudes warmth and comfort. The immaculate cleanliness of the space immediately caught our attention. Jhumu, the gracious wife of our host Abdullah, epitomized courtesy, authenticity, and genuine care throughout our stay. Their kindness reached its pinnacle when, facing difficulties securing an Uber, they generously offered us a lift to the main road. We express our deepest gratitude for their invaluable assistance during our time of need.
The guards/caretakers on the premises further contributed to the overall positive customer experience with their helpful and courteous demeanor. Their presence added an extra layer of service excellence. Additionally, the host's clear and detailed directions played a crucial role in navigating and locating the apartment easily. We extend our sincere appreciation for a memorable stay marked by exceptional hospitality.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: My family and I had a wonderful stay at this Airbnb! The location is incredibly convenient, and the hosts were exceptionally kind and accommodating. Abdullah and Jhumu went above and beyond during our stay, offering assistance in every possible way. The house is very clean and has a warm, homely atmosphere. I highly recommend this place for a comfortable and enjoyable experience.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Great place, absolutely recommend if you’re in Dhaka for a long time and in need of a place to stay. Fairly close to lot of great and busy areas to hangout or go about your day. The apartment was just as described, Abdullah and his wife were extremely helpful, checked in on me to see if I needed any help or any kind of assistance all throughout my stay while also respecting my privacy and space. I’d love to visit their place again, thanks.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · September 2022,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
Very disappointed that no one was present at the airport to receive us even when assurances were given by Rowdra ‘not to tension’ and a pick-up will be arranged. He arrived at the airport after two hours of us clearing checkout, and also after multiple phone calls. This was annoying and unacceptable when full details of the flight arrival times were given to him and agreed transfers and additional payment.
The apartment itself is clean but certainly not as shown on the published images on Airbnb. It is dated, there are marks on the walls and ceilings, plasters and paints falling off in couple of walls. Showers are not functional as they should be and one had rusted shower head. Not enough crockeries and kitchen utensils present at the apartment. No table knives, forks, spoons given. The TV did not function. The set-up is very basic. We also found couple of cockroaches in the kitchen and resorted to washing all utensils and crockeries before use. The kitchen sink was partially blocked and took a long time to drain.
The hostess Jhumu was a charming lady, and always eager to help, and so was the staff, Yunus who helped us with the luggage and queries.
The apartment is in old Dhaka and difficult to locate however, most rickshaw operators in the Rayer Bazar area knew Jarina Girls School, and that helped immensely, because the apartment is just opposite to the school entrance.
Overall, rating is average. For short stay, a week or so may be bearable. The images on the Airbnb and other sites need to be updated and must reflect the present state of the apartment.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · June 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Liked: Very nice of the host (Mr. Rowdra) to come and greet. The apartment was clean. Probably safe too.
Did not like: No airconditioner in the dining area (minor problem). The house is located in a crowded area, a bit inside so you do not hear the noise from the market, but it was hard to find. Checking-in was okay, but almost a crowd of people (kids and adults) was there to greet. Neighbors could see inside the apartment. The apartment lacks privacy.
